title: Chegg CEO calls 48% stock plunge over ChatGPT fears 'extraordinarily overblown'
description: Chegg's stock was almost halved on Tuesday after CEO Dan Rosensweig warned that OpenAI's ChatGPT was "having an impact" on customer growth.

title: AMD revenue drops 9% as PC chip sales decline sharply
description: AMD's report comes as the PC industry is in a deep slump, with shipments dropping 30% in the first quarter, according to IDC.

title: Starbucks earnings beat as China reverses same-store sales declines
description: Starbucks reported earnings after the bell. Here are the results.

title: Ford Motor earnings are out — here are the numbers
description: Ford reported earnings after the bell. Here are the results.

title: Chegg shares drop more than 40% after company says ChatGPT is killing its business
description: Chegg beat first-quarter expectations on the top and bottom lines but issued a weak second-quarter revenue outlook.

title: PacWest falls more than 20% as regional bank stocks slide to new lows
description: Regional bank stocks saw their losses for the week deepen as investors digest the failure of First Republic.

title: Hollywood writers are on strike — here's what it means for TV and movie production
description: Writers are seeking more compensation to reflect the content boom driven by streaming over the past several years.

title: Drugs, guns and crypto seized, 288 arrested, in 'unprecedented' dark web crackdown
description: Operation SpecTor took down the darknet site Monopoly Market and resulted in the arrests of 288 suspects who sold drugs and other goods for crypto.

title: Lawmakers urge SEC to crack down on Chinese retail giant Shein over alleged forced labor
description: Shein, a major fast-fashion brand, is under fire for allegedly selling clothes made by forced labor in China.

title: That simple 'hi' text from a stranger could be the start of a scam that ends up costing you millions
description: "Pig butchering" operations run out of Asia but target victims globally, with scammers promising love and wealth to get their victims to invest their fortunes.

title: Nearly 25% of jobs are set to be disrupted in the next five years — and A.I. could play a key role: World Economic Forum
description: WEF expects there to be 14 million fewer jobs overall in five years' time as labor markets face an overhaul from AI and a slew of other factors.

title: Crypto exchange owned by embattled conglomerate Digital Currency Group loses top global exec
description: Vijay Ayyar, Luno's vice president of corporate development and international, resigned from the firm after seven years working there.

title: BP beats first-quarter profit expectations but shares slide 6% on slowing buyback program
description: The first-quarter results come after a year of whopping profits for Big Oil.

title: Samsung bans use of A.I. like ChatGPT for employees after misuse of the chatbot
description: Samsung confirmed on Tuesday that it is temporarily restricting the use of generative AI products, such as ChatGPT, through the company's personal computers.

title: One-pilot planes are a possibility as aviation embraces A.I., Emirates president says
description: One-pilot planes could be on the horizon thanks to rapid developments in artificial intelligence, Emirates President Tim Clark told CNBC.

title: 'Other problems might be lurking': Strategist is unconvinced by Jamie Dimon's bank crisis comments
description: JPMorgan Chase CEO Jamie Dimon's assertion that turmoil in the banking sector was effectively ended by the resolution of First Republic may be premature, one analyst has suggested.

title: Tesla hikes prices in U.S., China and other markets after multiple cuts
description: Tesla increased the price of vehicles including its Model 3 and Model Y in the U.S., China, Canada, and Japan.

title: Euro zone core inflation slows unexpectedly in April, blurring the picture for rate hikes
description: Inflation in the euro zone rose in April, according to preliminary data released Tuesday, remaining significantly above levels targeted by the European Central Bank.

title: 'We love competition': Qatar Airways CEO welcomes new Saudi carrier
description: "We will compete like we have been competing all these years," Qatar's CEO Akbar Al Baker said at the Arabian Travel Market conference in Dubai.

title: Singapore's largest lender expects net interest margins will decline, but sees other growth drivers
description: With limited upside from these levels, CEO Piyush Gupta said he expects the pace of decline will be very gradual and not "falling off a cliff."

title: We're in the AOL phase of artificial intelligence, tech CEO says, as industry raves about A.I.
description: Sachin Dev Duggal, CEO of Builder.ai, said we've only just begun to see what's possible with AI and that the space is in need of a reality check.

title: Banking in the metaverse? A.I. could be about to change the way you manage your money
description: Artificial Intelligence will impact all parts of our lives — including money. Here's what experts think could happen and what you need to know.

title: Australia unexpectedly hikes rates, hints at more tightening ahead
description: The Reserve Bank of Australia hiked 25 basis points to 3.85% as economists polled by Reuters expected it to pause for a second consecutive time.

title: IMF raises 2023 economic outlook for Asia, sees China and India making up half of global growth
description: The International Monetary Fund said Asia-Pacific growth will primarily be driven by China's recovery and "resilient" growth in India as the rest of the world braces for slowed growth.

title: Biden will end Covid vaccine mandates for federal workers and international travelers on May 11
description: The Biden administration will end Covid vaccine mandates for federal employees, contractors and air travelers on May 11.
